definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Jarvis says this definition is too tidy.
sentences.chinese: 贾维斯说，这种定义太过简单化。

sentences.english: In part, nutritionists fell victim to a desire to simplify their dietary recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 部份原因在于营养学家太想把饮食建议简单化。

sentences.english: But the epoch of the bourgeoisie simplified the class antagonisms.
sentences.chinese: 但是，资产阶级时代的新时代却使阶级对立简单化了。
我怎么让它们更简单化？

sentences.english: The widespread availability of free or very low cost development tools makes creating a business almost scarily simple.
sentences.chinese: 遍布的免费或着低成本的发展工具使创业大为简单化。

sentences.english: But crucial facts have been lost in this simplistic red-hazed debate.
sentences.chinese: 但关键事实已在这场过分简单化的红肉辩论中遗失了。

sentences.english: What is the most difficult part about simplifying your life?
sentences.chinese: 让生活简单化最困难的一点是什么呢？

sentences.english: So if you’re designing a product line, keep it simple.
sentences.chinese: 所以说，如果你想设计一个产品线，让它简单化。

sentences.english: "We have this very simplistic view of reptiles," said Shine.
sentences.chinese: 我们对爬虫类动物的认识太过简单化了。

sentences.english: That is far too simplistic a view.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个过于简单化的观点。

sentences.english: Use v. boars to simplify the process.
sentences.chinese: 利用输精管结扎的公猪，可使过程简单化。

sentences.english: While there is some basis for this belief, it is certainly an oversimplification.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这种信念有一些基础，也确实太过于简单化了。

sentences.english: There is admittedly artificiality and oversimplification in this approach.
sentences.chinese: 人们承认这种方法带有人为性并且过分简单化。

sentences.english: Applied too broadly, "Keep it simple" would impoverish my life.
sentences.chinese: 广泛应用“简单化”会让我的生活贫瘠。

sentences.english: I am suggesting that balance take the place of overly-simplified solutions.
sentences.chinese: 而是强调以两者的平衡来取代过于简单化的选择。

sentences.english: The key to avoiding oversimplification is respecting the problem you're trying to resolve.
sentences.chinese: 避免将问题过于简单化的关键是尊重你要解决的问题。

definition: to come to the surface/to become apparent
